nodes.text: The Toydarian female Venta was the grandmother of Garri, a Toydarian who lived on the planet Utapau during the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems. When Garri was interrogated by Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker during an investigation into the death of Jedi Master Tu-Anh, he swore on Venta's life that he was not lying to the Jedi, when in fact he was.

Venta was first mentioned in A Death on Utapau, an episode in the canceled sixth season of Star Wars: The Clone Wars which was released as an unfinished story reel on StarWars.com in 2014 as part of The Clone Wars Legacy.
